expressions.expression: One of the key advantages of
expressions.fullSentence: One of the key advantages of remote work is increased flexibility.
expressions.usage: Introducing the first or most important advantage
variants: One of the main benefits of...
examples: One of the key advantages of online learning is accessibility.
One of the key advantages of renewable energy is environmental sustainability.

expressions.context: Online learning ___ students to study at their own pace
expressions.fullSentence: Online learning enables students to study at their own pace.
expressions.usage: Shows how something gives ability or opportunity
examples: Technology enables us to communicate instantly.
This system enables workers to access data remotely.

expressions.context: Social media ___ people to stay connected
expressions.fullSentence: Social media encourages people to stay connected with friends and family.
examples: The program encourages students to think critically.
This policy encourages companies to invest in green technology.

expressions.fullSentence: Electric vehicles make it easier to reduce carbon emissions.
expressions.usage: Shows how something simplifies or improves a process
expressions.pattern: Subject + makes it easier to + verb
examples: Apps make it easier to track expenses.
This tool makes it easier to organize information.

expressions.expression: The main argument in favour of
expressions.fullSentence: The main argument in favour of renewable energy is environmental sustainability.
examples: The main argument in favour of public transport is reducing congestion.
The main argument in favour of this policy is economic efficiency.

expressions.context: ___ urbanization is improved access to services
expressions.fullSentence: One positive aspect of urbanization is improved access to services.
expressions.usage: More neutral than 'advantage' - good for balanced essays
examples: One positive aspect of technology is increased efficiency.
One positive aspect of globalization is cultural exchange.

expressions.fullSentence: Public transportation helps reduce traffic congestion in cities.
expressions.usage: Showing contribution to a positive outcome
expressions.note: 'to' is optional: helps reduce = helps to reduce
examples: Exercise helps improve mental health.
This method helps students learn faster.

expressions.fullSentence: A major benefit of bilingualism is enhanced cognitive flexibility.
examples: A major benefit of exercise is stress reduction.
A major benefit of this approach is cost savings.

expressions.fullSentence: Automation permits companies to increase productivity significantly.
expressions.usage: Academic and business contexts (more formal than 'allows')
examples: This policy permits greater flexibility.
The system permits users to customize settings.

expressions.context: Flexible working hours ___ employees balance work and personal life
expressions.fullSentence: Flexible working hours let employees balance work and personal life more effectively.
expressions.usage: Less formal - better for general essays, not academic
examples: Technology lets us work from anywhere.
This app lets you track your progress.
